name: 黃有評
objective: This course aims to teach students how to apply the matrix arithematic and algebra, and in particular matrix multiplication, row reduction, and complex matrix operations in solving the engineering problems.
schedule:
1. Overview
2. Linear Equations
3~4. Linear transformations
5~6. Subspace of Rn and their dimensions
7~8. Linear spaces
9~10. Orthogonality and least squares
11~12. Determinants
13~15. Eigenvalues and eigenvectors
16~18. Symmetric matrics and quadratic forms
scorePolicy:
1. Mid-term exam.: 30%
2. Final exam.: 30%
3. Homeworks+ quizzes+ others: 40%
materials: Textbook: Otto Bretscher, Linear Algebra with Applications, 4th Ed., Pearson Education International, 全華圖書代理
